price: (Saa berε no) na ne yere gyina hͻ, na ͻseree; na yεde Is’haaq (awoͻ) ho bͻhyε hyεε no bͻ; na Is’haaq akyiri no Ya’quub (na ͻbεtͻ so ayε wo nana).
arabic: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ قَآئِمَةٞ فَضَحِكَتۡ فَبَشَّرۡنَٰهَا بِإِسۡحَٰقَ وَمِن وَرَآءِ إِسۡحَٰقَ يَعۡقُوبَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-im'ra-atuhu qāimatun faḍaḥikat fabasharnāhā bi-is'ḥāqa wamin warāi is'ḥāqa yaʿqūba
translations: Then We gave her glad tidings
